name: Linear Toolkit
description: Complete Linear project management toolkit with 93+ operations for creating, querying, updating, and transitioning issues. Supports both user queries and agent automation with task completion hooks.
author: Linear Toolkit Team

api.title: Linear Toolkit API
api.description: Comprehensive API for interacting with Linear issues and projects

tools.name: query_issue
tools.description: Query a specific Linear issue by ID. Use this when you need to check the status, details, or any information about a specific issue.

issue_id.description: Linear issue identifier (e.g., MIS-598 or LIN-123)

tools.name: search_issues
tools.description: Search for Linear issues using a query string. Returns matching issues from all teams or a specific team.

tools.name: get_issue_status
tools.description: Get the current status of an issue including state, assignee, and progress.

tools.name: get_active_work
tools.description: Get all active work items assigned to the current user or team.

user_id.description: Optional: Get active work for specific user

tools.name: create_issue
tools.description: Create a new Linear issue. Provide title and description at minimum. Include team_id to assign to specific team.

tools.name: update_issue
tools.description: Update an existing issue's title, description, priority, or assignee.

tools.name: add_comment
tools.description: Add a comment to an issue. Useful for providing updates, summaries, or additional context.

tools.name: transition_issue
tools.description: Move an issue to a different state (e.g., 'In Progress' → 'In Review' → 'Done').

tools.name: mark_issue_done
tools.description: Mark an issue as complete/done. This is the primary method for closing issues.

issue_id.description: Issue ID to mark as done

summary.description: Optional: Summary comment to add before marking done

tools.name: batch_update_issues
tools.description: Update multiple issues at once for bulk operations.

changes.description: Fields to update (title, description, priority, assignee_id)

updates.description: Array of issues and their updates

tools.name: list_operations
tools.description: List all available Linear Toolkit operations organized by category. Use this to discover what operations are available.

category.description: Category to list (query, create, update, transition) or 'all' for everything

examples.description: User wants to check issue status

examples.user: Create a new issue for authentication testing
examples.description: User wants to create a new issue

params.title: Add authentication testing
params.description: Need to add comprehensive test coverage for new authentication flows

examples.description: User wants to find related issues

on_task_completion.description: Automatically triggers when an agent completes a Linear task
on_task_completion.behavior: Updates Linear issue status to Done and adds completion summary as comment

context.description: Operations are lazy-loaded on demand to minimize context usage. Full operation details available in linear-operations-index.json

authentication.description: Set LINEAR_API_KEY environment variable with your Linear API key
